title: I Found a Wife Whose Engagement was Broken Off in the Neighboring Country, But She’s Too Cute, What Should I Do? - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Reincarnated in Another World   Royalty
author: Bushu Seiran (Sakura Seiran)   武州青嵐（さくら青嵐）
description:
The third son of the Tedros Royal Family, Salyu attended an engagement ceremony in a neighboring country as his mother's escort.

However, the country’s Crown Prince, Arios, had suddenly rebutted his fiancée, Lady Citroën, ever so violently, rudely declaring that he will be canceling their engagement.

“A lady of your appearance is not meant to be wed to me.”

Salyu could no longer bear to listen to his discourteous remarks, ended up intervening.

And by chance, he winded-up taking her as his fiancée.

'That aside, what does she look like?'

When the engagement ceremony happened, the lady was covered with a veil from head to toe, he was clueless about her appearance.

The petulant crown prince, Arios, had mocked her, and the people around him had told him not to get his hopes up.>
